answers.answer: Leg crampings are normal.  When I was pregnant with my first two I would wake up in the middle of the night because of those blimmin leg cramps.  With the headaches could your back be out???  I only say that becuase I had a headache yesterday because I moved a lot of furniture by myself or are you dehydrated.

Liz headaches and leg cramps are very common in pregnancy. Try ice or heat on your head for the headache and the leg cramps sleep w a pillow between your legs, stretch your legs before bed or try extra calcium (but don't over do the calcium it can cause kidney stones). I hope this helps. If you are concerned it is diabetes related speak with your OB about having the glucose screening done or other testing. Feel better :)

question: I am in my 20th week , this week i have been facing giddiness,Headache and legs cramping on daily bases ....which stresses me out badly end of the day .please note - i am juvenile diabiticregards,liz
title: giddiness, headache,legs cramping
